conversation.phrase: Be honest... did you steal a Tribble once the shoot wrapped?
conversation.name: Interview
conversation.label: Interview:

conversation.name: Nichelle Nichols
conversation.label: Nichelle Nichols:
conversation.phrase: I didn't wait until the end. I got mine the first day!

conversation.name: Walter Koenig
conversation.label: Walter Koenig:
conversation.phrase: I didn't steal a Tribble. I did, however, have several of them burned in what can only be described as a heretical cult ceremony.

conversation-text:
Interview: Be honest... did you steal a Tribble once the shoot wrapped? 
Nichelle Nichols: I didn't wait until the end. I got mine the first day!
Walter Koenig: I didn't steal a Tribble. I did, however, have several of them burned in what can only be described as a heretical cult ceremony.
